channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ChatGPT launches an app store, lets developers know it’s open for business
item.description: OpenAI is looking to populate its flagship chatbot with a host of new user experiences.

item.title: ICE Seeks Cyber Upgrade to Better Surveil and Investigate Its Employees
item.description: The agency plans to renew a sweeping cybersecurity contract that includes expanded employee monitoring as the government escalates leak investigations...

item.title: ChatGPT’s mobile app hits new milestone of $3B in consumer spending
item.description: ChatGPT has reached $3B in lifetime mobile consumer spending in just 31 months, faster than TikTok and major streaming apps.

item.title: 7 Best Cheap Phones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: There’s little reason to pay top dollar for a smartphone. These iPhones and Android devices—ranging from $100 to $600—stood up to WIRED’s testing.

item.title: Instacart to pay $60M to settle FTC claims it deceived consumers
item.description: The federal agency alleged Instacart misled consumers with unlawful tactics, causing them to pay higher fees while also denying refunds.

item.title: The Ultra-Realistic AI Face Swapping Platform Driving Romance Scams
item.description: Capable of creating “nearly perfect” face swaps during live video chats, Haotian has made millions, mainly via Telegram. But its main channel vanished...

item.title: Pickle Robot adds Tesla veteran as first CFO
item.description: Jeff Evanson recently joined Pickle Robot as the company's first CFO as the startup has allegedly expanded its partnership with UPS.

item.title: Thuma Classic Bed Frame Review: Functional Meets Fabulous
item.description: This fashionable favorite bed frame eliminates the need for tools during setup, instead using a Tetris-like stacking process

item.title: Why British politicians are flocking to American tech giants
item.description: Former British Chancellor of the Exchequer George Osborne has joined OpenAI as managing director and head of OpenAI for Countries. He also will run Co...

item.title: Don't Miss This Kindle Sale: Paperwhite, Colorsoft, and Accessories
item.description: If your favorite reader is the one left on your Christmas list, good news: Several Kindles and Kindle accessories are on sale right now for your last-...
